item.text: Trustless Transactions are transactions without the need for a trusted third party.
Example: eliminates the role of many intermediaries, thereby reducing transactions costs by introducing much needed competition to incumbent firms.

story.text: Trustless Transactions are transactions without the need for a trusted third party.

Example: eliminates the role of many intermediaries, thereby reducing transactions costs by introducing much needed competition to incumbent firms.
